data.body: The streaming renderer in the CLI receives batch JSON when stream param not recognized. Fix: (1) add defensive guard skipping events without category/label, (2) guard ev.summary with || '' to prevent undefined coercion, (3) use req.nextUrl instead of new URL(req.url) in route.ts
data.description: The streaming renderer in the CLI receives batch JSON when stream param not recognized. Fix: (1) add defensive guard skipping events without category/label, (2) guard ev.summary with || '' to prevent undefined coercion, (3) use req.nextUrl instead of new URL(req.url) in route.ts
data.title: Fix foolery doctor showing undefined instead of check results
